Class Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Tower
  • public abstract class Tower
extends greenfoot.Actor
    The abstract superclass for towers, which the player places to defend themselves from the cat hordes. Has functionality to upgrade towers using "cat food", as well as a method to track and set the duration of the stun effect created by the Boss Cat.

    As our towers (factory tower, which makes cat food, and water tower/paragon, which attacks cats) are very different, they don't have a lot of shared functionality.

    Version:
    June 2022
    Author:
    Thomas Yang
